title: House repair
content:
To repair your house, we'll need you to gather some materials. Please collect 50 wood and 20 stone.

After you collect everything, head to the Carpenter store and create an order at the counter. Your house will be repaired on the same day!

title: Island Activities
content:
Looking for a way to pass the time? Or maybe, you want to earn extra coins while waiting for your crops to grow?

When you have the time, please visit us at the Beach Shack. We have the perfect welcome gifts for you!

title: Hooman meet me
content:
Afraid I was, when you summoned me. 
But open the path she has, to my home.

This mean, hooman must come visit me.
Understand you will after meet, how to heal island.
 
Left of your farm, my home. If confused, look at drawing I share.

title: Diving Opportunity
content:
The lab is now looking for a suitable diving candidate.
All applicants must conduct an on-site test for compatibility.

Visit the diving pier for more information.

title: B.O.S Entrance Exam
content:
Hey kid. I've noticed that the elevator for the earth shaft now reaches level 10. I'm aware that it was your doing.

Since you've shown yourself to be capable, here's a task: Defeat 30 monsters, then swing by our guild room once the job is completed. Consider this your entrance exam.

P.S.: The guild is right beside my house.

title: Fulfill your fashion needs!
content:
White Flamingo boutique will be opening an outdoor shop in the heart of Starlet Town in a few days!
Let us help you find your next outfit.

Hooman. Thank you for help me.

I want show our village to you.

I talk to Chieftain. Chieftain says okay.

I wait.

title: Looking for Hibiscus
content: I need a <Items>hibiscus</>. If you have any, please send it my way. Gratuity awaits.

title: Looking for Kelp
content: I'm planning on writing an article about the ocean and in need of a bottle of legendary <Items>kelp</>. Please let me know if you have 1 for me to purchase.

title: Looking for Tea leaves
content: Will you be planting some tea this winter? If so, please send some my way. I would like to send some local <Items>tea leaves</> back to my parents.

title: Mayor's Lost Hat
content: I lost one of my <Items>hats</> the other day. The wind was powerful, and it blew away. So, please, should you find my <Items>hat</>, kindly return it to me.

title: Looking for Mushroom
content: How is Fall back in Coral Island? My friend is looking for a <Items>black trumpet mushroom</> and will pay a lot of money for it. There should be plenty growing around the lake. So if you find any, please save one for me.
greetCloseMessage: See you when I get back!

title: The Broken Easel
content: Since you seem to have many tools, would it be okay if I borrow your <Items>Pickaxe</> to fix my easel? When you can, please meet me near my house. Don't forget the tool!

title: Looking for Pumpkin
content:
Will you be able to provide me with a <Items>pumpkin</>? I have a recipe that I would like to try.
Good luck with this busy season. I hope to see you around.

title: Looking for Sunflower
content: Can you please help me with one <Items>sunflower</>? <NPCName>Oliver</> and I are making his dad a sunflower crown for his birthday. The problem is that we don't have any sunflowers. You need to deliver it to me before the 26th, okay? Because that's when his birthday is.

title: Looking for Arapima
content: I'm in need of <Items>arapaima</>. This fish likes colder weather and is usually out after sunset.

title: Looking for Papayas
content: Summer has arrived. I'm wondering if you will be planting some papayas on your farm. If so, please spare some for me. I need two <Items>papayas</>, and I will give you a premium price for them.

title: Help!
content: I'm planning to make <NpcName>Frank</> his favorite dinner, <Items>sunny side-up</>. Would you sell me some eggs? I'm around.

title: Neighbour's Help
content: I have to say, I am writing to you today with an agenda in mind. While collecting video footage the other day, I caught several animals stumbling on a large log behind my house. They fell and hurt themselves. I hate to be a bother, but can you break the log? I don't have the tool to do so and need your help on this.

title: Stolen box of rocks
content: I think my <Items>box of rocks</> is STOLEN! I'm asking mom and dad to help me find them, but they don't play around the island very often. Since I always see you out and about, can you please help me find it? The last time I played with it was when <NpcName>Zoe</> and I had a playdate near the <Places>lake</>. I will look for it too, but my curfew is at 5 pm and mom said I have to eat my vegetables.

title: A little help?
content: If you have any fresh <Items>spring vegetables </>, please send one my way.

title: Visit the Beach Shack
content: Come to the<Places>Beach Shack</> when you have the time.

title: New item alert!
content:
Introducing Basic Bag. It has a total of 20 compartments. That is a WHOLE 5 EXTRA compartments than basic tool belts. Carry more, do more, worry less!

Available now at Sam's General Store for 500 coins.

title: House upgrade: kitchen!
content: I say a house is not a home until you can cook in it. Joko and I can upgrade your house and add a nice kitchen. Visit us when you're ready for an upgrade.

title: Kitchen Appliances
content: Stop by Socket and Pan and take a look at our kitchen appliances! Each will help you cook different dishes. Hone your cooking skill, and expand your culinary horizon!

title: Horse
content: If you want to make your life a little easier, you should get a horse! They're very fast, a complete time saver if you travel a lot. Come and see me if you're interested.

title: Well, Time For A Well
content: I thought I should let you know we can build you a well if you'd like. It might make farming easier if you can have water sources everywhere on your farm.

title: Upgrade Your Watering Can!
content: I can help you upgrade your watering can if you haven't already. It will be able to water more plants than your current ones. You will need to provide the metal bars and some fees, but it will be worth it. Trust me!

title: Reminder!
content: With one season ending, another one begins. It is a reminder that your crops might wither as the season changes, so don’t forget to harvest them all. The last day of the season is the 28th. Also, stop by Sam’s General Store for new, seasonal seeds on the first!

title: Dating life
content:
You're really hitting it off with everyone, huh?

Just a heads-up, our island has a tradition. If you want to be more than "just friends" with someone, you'll need to give them a <items>Locket</>. Otherwise, your friend will only be that, just your friend.

But remember, <PlayerName>$player</>, not everyone may accept the <items>Locket</> Some are married or not interested in romance. So, just keep that in mind when you're tossing <items>Locket</> around, okay?

Drop by our our shop to grab one!

title: A Thank You
content: I saw that you completed someone's request on the bulletin board. I'm impressed. Thank you for actively taking a part in this community.
Come to empty cabin in forest. We sell item to you.

title: Mysterious Letter
content:
Word travels fast in the archipelago. You have an eye for hard-to-come-by things, while I am a purveyor of rare finds.

The Lighthouse, T-TR-F, after sundown. Discreet business only.

title: The item upgrade is completed
content: Your new shiny tool is ready for pick-up! Please come to the shop at your convenience.

title: Inventory is full
content: You're receiving this mail because your inventory was full earlier.

title: Cherry blossom potluck
content:
We're gathering at the <Places>lake</> tomorrow to celebrate the start of Spring. The festival is a cookout potluck, so make sure to bring something yummy!

Arrive between 09:00 and 14:00.

title: Tree Planting Event
content:
Tomorrow the town will be looking for volunteers to attend the Tree Planting Festival.

If you'd like to volunteer, pay us a visit between 08:00 and 14:00. We meet in the forest right behind your farm. 

We'll start the Tree Planting Festival as soon as we gather enough volunteers. We could sure use the helping hand of a farmer like yourself!
<PlayerName>$player</>, meet me at the beach west of the diving spot tomorrow evening. See you at 6 pm.

title: Noah's Request: flowers
content:
<Places>Fishensips</> needs a couple of fresh <Items>flowers</>. Would your farm be able to supply? If so, please have them delivered as soon as possible.

ps: <NPCName>Sam's</> doesn't have a good selection. Gah.

title: Thank you
content: I made a little extra...

title: Noah's Request: woods
content: I'm helping my sister-in-law, <NPCName>Erika</>, with her school project. As you know, she sometimes volunteers at school and teaches the kids how to make bonfires next week. Will you come to <Places>garden lane</> tomorrow morning and help me cut some <Items>woods</>? It's the area near Millie's house. P.S: I will bring sandwiches.

title: Gift from Noah
content: Thank you for helping me yesterday

title: Gift from Charles
content: Thanks again for the free fish. Here is that free lunch that I promised you.

title: A news about our Town Rank
content:
I'm pleased to announce that Starlet Town has gained a E rank! It's not quite close yet to our previous rank, but I believe we can get there by doing our best to maintain this town we call home.

Due to the rank increase, distributors who left us are slowly returning. Now, you can get Fruit Seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, Duck & Goat from <NPCName>Jack</>, and a whole new categories of Clothing and Furnitures from <NPCName>White Flamingo</> boutique! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> got enough materials to build a Silo to restore your Coop and Barn, so check them out.

I would like to thank you for helping us in making this happen. I hope you can continue supporting us in returning this town to its former glory.

title: Good news about our Town Rank!
content:
I'm happy to announce that Starlet Town has gained a D rank! We are getting closer to our previous rank, which can only mean good things.

Due to the rank increase, we have been gaining more visitors and old distributors. Now, you can get Unique Crops from <NPCName>Sam</>, Sheep from <NPCName>Jack</>, and another new categories of Clothing and Furnitures from <NPCName>Wabanana</>! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can now build a Stable and upgrade your Coop and Barn, so be sure to check them all out.

Thank you once again for your efforts in helping this town. I can see our fellow neighbors regaining their passion for the town. Keep up the good work!

title: Improved laboratory
content:
The laboratory pieces of equipment now can do more research, especially on crops, seeds and the like.

Do visit the laboratory if you have the time to find out more!

title: Improved blacksmith
content: With the town getting livelier and livelier, we finally upgraded our furnace. We can now process more advanced tools. Please come by and check it out!

title: Great news about our Town Rank!
content:
I'm very pleased to announce that Starlet Town has gained a C rank! We are now only one step away from our previous rank. As you can see, the town's improvements over the previous weeks have been amazing.

With the town rank increasing, our visitor count and distributors are increasing too. This brings a lot of business to our local merchants. Now, you can plant a fruit tree with <NPCName>Sam's help</>, and he also now provides a Large-sized Bag. <NPCName>Jack</> can also provide you with Pig and Quail now, and other great categories of Clothing and Furnitures are available at <NPCName>Wabanana</>! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can now build a Greenhouse and further upgrade your Coop and Barn, so be sure to check them all out.

Thank you very much for your efforts in helping this town get back on its feet!

title: Big news about our Town Rank!
content:
I'm delighted to announce that Starlet Town has gained an B rank! We have regained our previous town rank, and our town is now back to its former glory.

Due to the rank increase, we have retained our previous visitor count and distributors! Businesses are booming! Now, you can get Winter Crops from <NPCName>Sam</>. <NPCName>Jack</> can now provide you with Peafowl, and other trendy categories of Clothing and Furnitures are available at <NPCName>Wabanana</>! <NPCName>Joko</> told me that he can now build a fish pond and upgrade your house, so be sure to check them all out.

I would like to express my gratitude for your help restoring the town to its former glory. Amazing job!

title: Important announcement about our Town Rank
content:
I'm ecstatic to announce that Starlet Town has gained A rank! This is the first time we have achieved it; we didn't even dare to dream of it happening years ago.

Due to the rank increase, we have recorded a new high in visitor count and distributors! Now, you can get Super-sized Bag from <NPCName>Sam</>, Luwak from <NPCName>Jack</>, and another excellent categories of Clothing and Furnitures from <NPCName>Wabanana</>! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> has informed me that we can now build an Insect Pond, so check them out.

Thank you very much for making this happen for all of us. It wouldn't be an overstatement to say that your role is significant in making this happen. Your efforts have inspired others to contribute more to the town, and it shows with our newest town rank. Well done!

title: Huge breakthrough!
content:
Thanks to your recent exploits in achieving a higher town rank, I now have access to seed splicing. This can help your crops tremendously and increase the variety in your produces.

Do visit the laboratory if you have the time in the future!

title: A Quick Catch-up
content:
How are you? I just wanted to check up on your well-being.

We heard that you're a farmer now. I hope things are going well with your farm and if you ever miss your old job, it's here.
Let's chat more about this. Hope to hear from you soon.

title: A Warning
content:
It is imperative that you return to your position at HyperForce. 

After looking through your contract, it is clearly stated that you must provide us with a certain amount of work that you have not completed to this date.

If you do not fulfill this condition, we will have no choice but to file a lawsuit against you and seek compensation for the damages incurred from your lapse in judgment.

However, we are willing to drop any sort of retaliation against you if you return to work within the week.

Regards,
J. Doe
Senior Manager

title: A Plea
content:
It embarrasses me to write this but please, please return to work. We're falling apart here. We didn't realize how important you were to our operation.

What do you need so that you will return? An increase in salary? A penthouse apartment? How about a free gym membership? Free lunch and dinner? A personal massage for me?

You know what, I'll visit your farm and personally convince you to come back. 

Wait for my arrival, <PlayerName>$Player</>. We'll talk soon.

Your best friend,
J. Doe
Senior Manager

title: Grandma's letter - 1
content:
How are you doing, sweetheart? I heard Coral Island is beautiful this time of year. Grandpa, Ashley and I miss you very much.


P.S: There is some money for you. It isn’t much but we hope it’s useful.

title: Grandma's letter - 2
content: It’s been a while since my last letter. How are you doing there, sweetheart? We miss you everyday. Ashley is giving me a hardtime lately, she refused her favorite food and are out most nights. Will take her to the vet soon. We made you some klepons, your favorite.

title: Grandma's letter - 3
content:
How’s the farm, sweetheart? We saw some articles about Coral Island’s Cherry Blossom festival. The event looked beautiful. I think I might’ve spotted you in one of the photos!

P.S: Ashley is pregnant!

title: Grandma's letter - 4
content:
It’s been a minute since I heard from you, sweetheart. We miss you so much. Your dad said you're doing well at the farm. It's great news, we're very proud. We baked you some cookies yesterday, hope it's still good.

P.S: The kittens and Ashley are all healthy. We ended up naming one of them Sandal because he refused to fall asleep without my sandal right next to him. Your grandpa and I are happy, busy grandparents again now.

title: Grandma's letter - 5
content:
Your parents sent us an article about you making a quarter of a million coins! We’re so happy you’ve found your community and thriving on Coral Island. We sent some extra money to add to the pile! The kittens are taking over our bedroom. We will let them sleep there with us. There is no winning with those cuties.

We’re beyond proud of you, <PlayerName>$Player</>.

title: A Thank You From Us
content:
It's heartwarming to see you help out around the island. There were a few folks that weren't so sure about you moving in. I won't say who they are, but I will tell you that they've come to me to say that they've changed their mind about you.

Keep up the good work!

title: A Thank You From Us
content: Thank you for helping around the island! The town residents and I wanted to thank you for how you've helped the community. We hope it'll help you in some way.

title: A Thank You From Us
content: We shouldn't be surprised by this point, but it still amazes me when I see the amount of work you've done for the community. Here's a little thanks from us. We are happy that you've become a part of our charming town.

title: A Thank You From Us
content: You have completed 100 errands for the residents of Starlet Town. 100! That's a fantastic thing you've done for the community. Thank you!

title: Faint By Time
content:
You passed out last night lying face down. Thought it was a dead body. Scared the heck out of me!

I found you pretty late, hope you weren’t staying up past midnight. Not good for ya. I had Yuri carry you home and make sure you’re okay. Your medical bill should be attached.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: You passed out last night from exhaustion. Attached is your medical bill. Please don't overwork yourself. Remember to take a break and never miss a meal. I hope you feel better!

title: Recipe: wild mushroom polenta
content: I just invented this recipe. I name it, wild mushroom polenta. You should try experimenting with it! Just...don't use too much of those brown mushrooms, okay?

title: Recipe: mooncake
content: Have you tried baking? It’s a good stress reliever for me, and it might be good for you too. Anyway, here is a mooncake recipe for you to bake at home. Give it a try!

title: Recipe: shredded jackfruit pie
content: Please enjoy the shredded jackfruit pie recipe that I enclosed with this mail. I’ve only been making it with freshly harvested jackfruits, so do keep that in mind.

title: Recipe: burrito
content: Nothing is better than a burrito full of locally grown ingredients. Here is a recipe on how to make your own burrito. Hope it’s helpful!

title: Recipe: fish soup
content: I'm sending you my favorite fish soup recipe. It was my late wife's. I hope you like it as much as I do.

title: Recipe: fried tempeh
content: Have you tried making fried tempeh? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.

title: Recipe: banana fritter
content: Have you tried making banana fritter? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.

title: Recipe: hawaiian pizza
content: You might want this recipe. It’s Hawaiian pizza.

title: Recipe: Assorted grilled platter
content: This is the recipe for one of my favorite things to cook at home. Easy and delicious! It might be your favorite too.

title: Recipe: fish taco
content: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here's one of my favorite recipes, fish taco. It’s a bit complicated, but I do not doubt that you’ll ace it.

title: Recipe: vegan taco
content: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here's one of my favorite recipes, vegan taco. It’s what I serve at the truck.

title: Recipe: Pepper and mushroom flatbread
content: Here’s a recipe I learned from a friend who learned it from another friend who…well, you get it. Thought I’d continue the chain and pass it on to you!

title: Recipe: bread
content: Here is the recipe we use at Sam's for bread for you to make your own at home. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!

title: Recipe: tart
content: Here is the recipe I use to make a tart. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!

title: Recipe: corn on a cob
content: Corn on a cob recipe is enclosed for my favorite farmer. Not a grill master for nothing. Hah!

title: Recipe: Kiracha hot sauce
content: Here is some instruction on how to make Kiracha hot sauce. It tastes best when you use fresh ingredients. This one elevates bland meals and gives them quite a kick!

title: Recipe: pad thai
content: Thought I’d share my pad thai recipe. I made it for the family last Sunday, and it was a hit. Let me know what you think.

title: Recipe: smoked salmon
content: In case you forget how to smoke a salmon, I wrote down the recipe for you. Here you go.

title: Recipe: green smoothies
content: Here is the green smoothies recipe, as promised.

title: Recipe: sauteed chard
content: Here is a recipe to make simple crunchy lunch—sauteed chard.

title: Recipe: seafood ramen
content: If you like ramen, try this recipe out for seafood ramen. One of my favorite, absolutely pho-nomenal
greetCloseMessage: A little noodle joke there for you,

title: Recipe: oven-baked risotto
content: I found this recipe in my drawers, oven-baked risotto. It’s probably my mom’s. I thought you might find good use of it.

title: Recipe: roasted chestnuts
content: Here is a recipe for roasted chestnuts. I’ve had one too many. Sick of it now, but it is a great and easy meal to make.

title: Recipe: (bomb!) gnocchi
content: This gnocchi recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.

title: Recipe: (bomb!) pizza
content: This pizza recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.

title: Recipe: boiled egg
content: Here is a simple boiled egg recipe.

title: Recipe: fried rice a.k.a nasi goreng
content: Yesterday, I was reminded of my childhood back in Indonesia. Thought you might want to try my comfort food, fried rice. Or, as we call it, “nasi goreng.”

title: Recipe: herbed tempeh
content: Not sure if you know how to make herbed tempeh. Really simple. Here you go!

title: Recipe: spider tempura
content: Recipe for spider tempura in the back of this letter. It isn’t my choice of meal, but it doesn't taste as bad as it sounds.

title: Recipe: lettuce wrap
content: While food can be extravagant, I myself prefer elegance in simplicity. You should mind what you're eating. I share you this lettuce wrap recipe because I care a lot.

title: Recipe: onigiri
content: I tried this onigiri recipe the other day and it was delicious. It’s written on the other side of this letter if you want to try it.

title: Recipe: Minced jackfruit pie
content: I remember you liked the minced jackfruit pie we made at the inn. Here’s the recipe for it! Why don’t you try making it for yourself?

title: Recipe: Hummus
content: I’m mailing you one of our favorite recipes, hummus. Why don’t you give it a try?

title: Gift Item
content: Here is a gift for you.

title: Town Rank Announcement
content:
To address the declining number of tourists on our island, the Mayor Office invited a Funlop Agency representative to rank our town. We're expecting some sort of award ceremony at the Community Center.

This is going to be our first-ever town rank!
Hopefully, the media coverage we get from being a top-rated island will boost our tourism.

content: Do not enter! Infestation. Dangerous inside.

content:
Here is a bag of seeds as a welcome gift from the <Places>General Store</>. Why don't you meet me there and I can introduce you to the owner, <NpcName>Sam</>. It's located in the middle of the town.

title: A Gift For The Community
content:
We wanted to do something special for you to celebrate our moving in. Our community outreach discovered that the hot spring isn't functional anymore. What a shame!

We couldn't let that pass, so we sent our brightest scientists and engineers to figure out the problem. We are pleased to inform you that the hot spring is 100% fully functional again! No need to thank us, residents. Your happy, smiling faces are enough thanks for us.

title: Mysterious Letter
content: I think it's time. Come to the pier.

title: Your PC is at risk
content: Send us your login credentials and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> - we can't proceed without it!

title: Water activities
content:
I hope you're settling in well. Seems like now is a good time to let you know about <Items>water activities</> in <Places>Coral Island</>.

When you have the time, you should visit <NpcName>Ling</> in the <Places>Lab</> to learn more about diving.
<NpcName>Sunny</> at the <Places>Beach Shack</> can also tell you a bit about fishing!

title: Your PC is at risk
content: Send us your login credentials and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> - we can't proceed without it!

title: Museum Opening RSVP
content: The <Places>Museum</> is opening tomorrow. We're expecting a packed venue, so arrive early. You know what they say, the early bird gets the worm!

We have compiled all the coral data you’ve recovered while diving. And we need to share the result with you.

Do come by the lab if you have time. We can have more discussion about it later.

title: Town rank: an idea to increase our popularity!
content: You've given me an idea about increasing our town's popularity. It involves Sam. So meet me at the General Store when you can, and I'll explain further there!

title: Adventure Awaits
content: You have cleared the Earth mine. It’s a great accomplishment! However, a new adventure is just beyond the horizon. A different part of the mine has opened and is waiting for you. Explore at your heart's desire.

title: Learn the Chest recipe
content: We forgot to remove this test mail from the game, so now you should have learned the <RickText.Place>Chest crafting recipe</>

title: Coral Nursery
content: Meet me in the <Places>Lab</>.

title: Coral data - 10m depth
content:
We have compiled all the coral data you’ve recovered while diving. And we really need to share the result with you.

Please come by the lab when you have time. We have something to discuss.

title: Test Side Mail
content: Hello, this is <RickText.Place>Side Quest</> Test Mail. Accept to start the quest.

title: Sample Gift
content: Hi, This is sample <RickText.Place>gift</> for you.

title: Challenge completed
content:
I'm glad to hear that the rumors of a new farmer in Starlet Town are true. You've been doing excellent work in the fields.

Give these fertilizers a try. Apply them to tilled soil. They'll increase your chances of harvesting higher quality crops, which will in turn fetch you more coins when it's time to sell.

title: Challenge completed
content:
It looks like you're ready for this. This here is a Basic sprinkler.

Place it in your field, and it'll water some of your crops for you. The best part? You can craft as many of these as you need, as long as you have the necessary materials.

title: Launch Pickstarter
content: Good news! We’re ready to launch our Pickstarter campaign, but we can’t do it without you! Come by the museum so we can launch it together.

title: We did it!
content:
I can’t believe this. We actually reached our Pickstarter goal in just one day! Oh man, it’s so exciting. I didn’t think we’d reach our goal so fast! 

Since we reached our goal so early, we’re adding some stretch goals for the campaign. Mainly, our museum is going to be bigger and grander than originally planned! But I’ll have to talk about this to Mayor Connor and Millie.

I’ll update you again later.

title: Still backing
content:
I still can’t believe it. People are still donating. Millie and I talked about it and we both want to honor the backers. Walls engraved with the names of all who backed, and statues for the higher-level backers, all in a new room for the museum. We’re calling it the Founder’s Hall.

We want this to be a grand reminder of the people that have helped us get to this point.

Exciting things are happening, <PlayerName>$player</>.

title: It's official
content:
Well. It’s official. The campaign is closed and we reached 4 times our original goal! That’s blowing my mind I’m running out of words to explain how I feel.

We’re starting construction of the Founder’s Hall as soon as possible. We’ll have an opening party and everything!

I’ll come get you on the day of the grand opening.

title: Local produce
content: I'd like to run an idea by you about local produce. Meet me at the general store when you have the time.

title: Recipe: Spring frittata
content: I wanted to give you this recipe for Spring frittata as a little gift. Don’t let the name fool you. You can make this any time of the year as long as you have the ingredients.

title: Recipe: Butter croissant
content: I’ve heard making butter croissants can be difficult, but I believe this recipe will make it much easier for you. Mother has made it many times, and I can vouch for its efficacy.

title: Recipe: Guacamole
content: Do you know how to make guacamole? If not, here’s a simple recipe for you to follow! Hope you like it!

title: Recipe: Veggie Ramen
content: How are you doing? Eating healthy meals every day, I hope. If you want to add something new to your rotation, here’s a recipe for one of my favorite meals.

title: Recipe: Eggplant Lasagna
content: Have you ever tried eggplant lasagna? It’s delicious! I got this recipe from one of my friends abroad. I’m not much of a cook, but this is a pretty easy recipe. Why don’t you give it a try?

title: Recipe: Clam Chowder
content: How are you doing? I was leafing through our family cookbook, and this recipe for clam chowder just fell out! None of us use this recipe often, and Mom said I can give it to you. Better than wasting it, right?

title: Recipe: Basil Pesto Pasta
content: I found this outside. Is it yours?

title: Recipe: Sweet potato poutine
content: Just checking in with you. I have this recipe for sweet potato poutine if you want to try cooking it. It’s my go-to comfort meal. Try it out!

title: Recipe: Sashimi
content: I’ve seen you fishing around the island. Here’s a recipe for sashimi. You can use any fish.

title: Challenge completed
content:
It seems like you're ready for this. This here is a Mayonnaise Machine. Just place any Egg into this here gizmo and it'll produce Mayonnaise. You'll have just made an artisan product.

Artisan products are made using Artisan machines, and fetch for a nice profit. Great gizmo's to have on your farm, ya hear!

title: Challenge completed
content:
You're now an advanced farmer. Great job, Sprout! My last gift to you is a blueprint for an aging barrel.

Place items into the aging barrel to produce aged artisan products. These yield the most profit, though they do require some time to mature.

title: Giant Village
content: Giants forget hooman can’t enter village. Come to Village, I open for hooman.

title: Band of Smile
content: Band of Smile - Work in Progress

title: Gong Request
content:
<NPCName>Gong.</> almost have all things <NPCName>Gong.</> need to be hooman, but <NPCName>Gong.</> still missing some things. This what <NPCName>Gong.</> need, can Hooman help?

Black round eye cover
Some baabaa hair
Any flower
Big big cloth thing, like one big boat man wear

Okay that all <NPCName>Gong.</> need.

title: Island Visit
content:
I wanted to let you know that the island ferry express is back open. 

What is it, you ask? It's me and my boat, and we take you into the waters. You can visit nearby islands, may haps you have some friends you'd like to visit. 

Where is it, you ask? Remember where I dropped you off your first day here? That's where.

title: Pet Adoption
content:
Dear residents of Starlet Town,

The pet shelter is now officially open. We've a variety of adorable pets you can take home. Visit us inside the community center, first room on the right. I guarantee you won't leave empty handed!

title: Kickstarter Exclusive "Farmer Outfit"
content:
We have two things for you today:

- Kickstarter Exclusive “Farmer Outfit” set (Backer farmer outfit)
- Additional free cosmestic. (Pandabacker farmer outfit)

Thank you for supporting us and for your patience during the key distribution chaos last year.

title: Marriage life
content:
Hey there, <PlayerName>$player,

Seems like you're making some really special connections.

If things are getting serious and you're considering marriage, we also have an islandtradition for that. You'll want to propose to your special someone with a <items>Diamond Ring</>.

Does this sounds like you? If so, drop by our shop and grab one!

title: Petrified Perpetrator
content: Rested and ready to tell us the story <NPCName>Giu</> is. To the village you must come and hear the story for your help we feel we will need.

title: Impressive Fishing Skills!
content:
I've been watching your progress, and I must say, your fishing skills are outstanding! I'm so glad you accepted our welcoming gifts when you first moved to the island. 

To help you level up even more, I'm sending you another special gift: a Fish Pond. With this pond, you'll be able to breed fish and continue to hone your skills.

title: You've Got a Real Knack for Catching Bugs!
content:
I couldn't help but notice how awesome you are at catching insects! I'm so glad you've put to use our welcoming gifts when you moved in. 

To keep that momentum going, I'm gifting you an Insect House. You'll be able to breed insects and become a true bug-catching master!

title: Let's Make Farming Easier!
content:
I’ve been working on automation and quality-of-life devices! They will make things easier for you on the farm.

Here's a prototype of one: the Auto Fertilizer. This nifty gadget can be attached to your sprinklers, and when loaded with fertilizer, it'll automatically disperse it to the surrounding soil.

I can make the blueprint if you provide me with materials for R&D. This will allow you to craft it using basic materials. If you're interested, come by the lab to see some of the other devices I've prototyped as well.

title: Animal Festival Tomorrow!
content: Don’t forget! The Animal Festival is tomorrow at 9 am in front of the community center. Make sure your animals are ready for some friendly competition.

title: Get Ready for the Animal Festival!
content: The Animal Festival is coming up on Summer 12. Bring your pet for a fun race. If you have a chicken or cow, enter them in the competition! The event starts at 9 am in front of the community center.

title: Beach Cleanup Tomorrow!
content: Join us for the annual Beach Cleanup tomorrow, Summer 27, at 9 am. Let’s work together to clean up the trash and enjoy fun games afterward. Bathing suits are welcome but not mandatory. Drinks are provided.
greetCloseMessage: See you all at the beach!

title: Get Ready for the Harvest Festival!
content:
The Harvest Festival is coming up on Fall 15 at 7 pm in Alun-Alun Square. Legendary farmer Jeff Smith will be the judge for the harvest display contest. To enter, bring your best products from each of the following six categories:
- Vegetables
- Fruits
- Flowers
- Coop products
- Barn products
- Artisan products

title: Harvest Festival Tomorrow!
content: The Harvest Festival is tomorrow at 7 pm in Alun-Alun Square. Remember to bring your six best items for the harvest display contest.

title: Spooky Day Starts Tomorrow!
content: Get ready for Spooky Day celebration starting tomorrow! Join us in town from 7 PM onwards for a host of games, a variety of costumes, and a captivating ogoh-ogoh parade!

title: Winter Fair Begins Tomorrow!
content: The Winter Fair starts tomorrow and runs for three days, from Winter 21–24. Join us at the beach from 1 pm until late. There will be shops, games, and the best Winter festivities.

title: New Year's Eve Feast Tomorrow!
content: You are invited to the New Year’s Eve Feast tomorrow, Winter 28, at 7 pm at the Hillside Vineyard. It’s a time for the community to come together and enjoy games and fireworks, and for the lovebirds, romance under the mistletoe!
greetCloseMessage: Let’s welcome the New Year together!

title: Your item has been delivered
content: The item you order from online shop has arrived.

title: One of Us
content: <PlayerName>$player</>. Cho Oyu has found something interesting. This is some fintastic news you don't want to miss!

title: Coral Island: Ocean Guardian Charity DLC Pack
content:
We have three things for you today:

- Ocean Guardian Outfit 
- Ocean Guardian Chest and Crafting Recipe
- Ocean Guardian Scarecrow and Crafting Recipe

Safeguard the seas of Coral Island—and our own real, beautiful world—with the limited-time 
Ocean Guardian Charity DLC Pack for your Coral Island character, fit for a true champion of planet Earth’s aquatic ecosystems.

Volleyball Tournament in Coral Island
Where: beach
When: noon
What: fun!

title: Hey!
content: What are you doing tonight? Come meet me at the bathhouse. Chill with me.

title: Game of Cones watch party
content: They’re airing my episode tomorrow! We’re setting up a watch party at the inn. Come and watch with us!

title: Release my Stephen
content: It’s finally time to say goodbye to Stephen. Please come to the beach at 6 if you’re able. I don’t think I can do this alone.

title: I invite you!
content: Do you want to go on a date with me? If so, I’ll be at the beach at sunset.

title: History of our Town
content: come see me at the library when you have time. I found something that might interest you!
Meet me at the beach tonight. Got something for you…

title: Party at Villa
content: Please join me at the villa tonight for a dinner party. I have an important announcement to make and I want you to be there.

title: To the space
content: Come to the bamboo forest if you have the time. Aaliyah’s spaceship is launching today. Watch with us!

title: Play with me!
content: The weather is great today. Come to the beach and play volleyball with me. Don’t arrive too late! Need the sun.

title: Date in Forest
content:
Up for some date night? Meet me tonight near the caravan.
Have a good day! Don’t skip breakfast.

title: Heal with me
content:
Have you ever done sound healing?
Join me in the forest at noon. It’s therapeutic.

title: Ghost...?
content:
I think I’m being watched.

Whenever I stay at the villa too late in the evening, I feel like someone is trying to talk to me.
When I look back, nothing is there.

Do you believe in ghosts? I can't say anything but meet me at the villa around 8 pm.
We will catch this thing. Will you tell Scott about it, too? Bring basil with you, just in case we need to wave it.

title: Private dinner
content: I hope this mail finds you well. I’d like to invite you to a private dinner tonight. I’ve set us up dinner in Alun-Alun Square. It would mean a lot to me if you could make it.
I rented some kayaks. Up for some fun at the beach? Come at noon.
A date for tomorrow evening? My place at 7pm. Bring nothing.

title: Hey lovely
content: Let’s go on a date, just you and me.  Meet me at the pier, 7 pm. Don’t bring anything, your lovely self is enough.

title: Hangout with homies
content:
It's Scott. I was thinking about you and how much fun we always have when we hung out.

Maybe you can come to the tavern this evening at 7 pm and meet my friends.

We are going to have so much fun.
Don't make me go to your farm and get you!

title: Just the two of us
content:
Scott here. Come to my house tonight after work.
So, around 7ish. Showing you something.

title: Observatory date
content:
I have something to show you. Come to the observatory tomorrow night! If that’s okay with you, I’d like to take you out for dinner afterward. Just you and me.

P.S: It’s a DATE, hope that was obvious and okay with you!

title: Did you see my pen?
content:
Did I leave my pen on your farm? I am pretty sure that I had it with me when I got your health record.

Look around for me, will you?

title: Sorry...
content:
Please forgive me for such an abrupt end to our conversation yesterday. 

Duty calls, yada yada yada. Will you meet me tonight after work at the beach?
I found an old painting. Thought you might like it.

title: Fish Taco Dinner?
content:
Are you free for dinner tomorrow night? I was thinking maybe we can have some fish tacos from Emma's Truck.

I have a little something set up. Nothing crazy so don't dress up.

Stop by the clinic around 6ish and we’ll go together?

title: Best Fish Taco
content: Taco was awesome last night. I had an amazing time.

sender: The Royal Council of Naga Castle
title: [text WIP]
content:
In recognition of your service to our Kingdom, <NPCName>King Krakatoa</> and <NPCName>Queen Nanda Devi</> extend an invitation for you to visit <Places>Naga Castle</>.

We look forward to welcoming you at the castle.

title: Ritual
content:
Greetings from <NPCName>Cho Oyu</>. The fates have chosen wisely, letting you into our Kingdom.

I request your presence in my chambers. There's a ritual the spirits urge me bestow on you that will be worth your while.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: You were out cold yesterday, so I took you to the clinic. They said you've just pushed yourself to the limit. They also handed me your bills, so I'm passing them along. They're in the envelope.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: Pal, you scared the daylights out of me yesterday. Seeing you passed out like that, it was really frightening! The doctors said it's extreme fatigue. Please, take it easy today. I've got your hospital bill here as well. It's right inside the envelope.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: You passed out yesterday. I got you to the hospital. You need to take better care of yourself. Check the back of this letter for your bills.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: I saw you out cold yesterday and rushed you to the hospital. Pretty scary stuff, to be honest. Hope you're back on your feet soon. Your hospital bills are tucked behind this letter.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: How are you doing? I saw you collapse yesterday. I'm worried about you. I hope you're feeling better soon. Got your hospital bills tucked behind this letter.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: I found you passed out yesterday. It got me really worried so I took you to the clinic. I hope you get better soon, golden hawk! Your clinic charges are right behind this letter.

title: Faint By Stamina
content:
I saw you passed out yesterday and carried you to the hospital. I was told it was nothing serious but you do need to rest. Hope you're feeling better soon.
You'll find your hospital bills behind this letter.

title: Faint By Stamina
content: I saw you passed out yesterday. You're too tired, I'll tell you that. Hopin' you're fit as a fiddle real soon! Got your hospital bills tucked behind this here letter.

title: Faint By Stamina
content:
Are you okay? I found you passed out yesterday, and you were sweating so much! I think you've been working too hard. Please, get some rest.
The hospital also told me to give you this bill. I hope you are getting better soon.

title: Faint By Stamina
content:
I found you passed out yesterday. The doctors told me that you're suffering from extreme fatigue. Please rest.

PS:  The medical bill is in this mail. Hope you feel better soon!

Just a heads up, your animals might get sick if it gets too hot or cold, or if they're not looked after properly. If that happens, Animal Medicine is your best friend. You can pick some up at my Ranch or the Clinic.

I've tossed in a dose with this letter. Better safe than sorry, right?

title: Please help me
content:
I am in the belly of the whale now, so to speak! I forgot <NPCName>Anne</>'s birthday, and I need to fix this fast.

Unfortunately, my daily activities don't allow me to look for this myself, so I'm going to need your help to find me a Green tea. One is fine!

If you can find it, I owe you a big one.
greetCloseMessage: Please look for it ASAP, and thanks!

title: Coral Island: Ocean Explorer Charity DLC Pack
content:
We have three things for you today:

- Ocean Explorer Outfit
- Ocean Explorer Chest and Crafting Recipe
- Ocean Explorer Scarecrow and Crafting Recipe

Make an oath to save the ocean—and our own real, beautiful world—with the limited-time Ocean Explorer Charity DLC Pack for your Coral Island character, fit for a true explorer of planet Earth’s aquatic ecosystems.

title: A No-Show, Huh?
content:
Guess what? You weren't at the Harvest Festival! But that's okay. Maybe competitions just aren't your thing.
You seemed a little shy when we first met, right? It's all good though, buddy.
Daddy always used to say, "Courage is the first step to victory." Looks like you're still trying to find your shoes, huh?
Don't sweat it, though. If you're ever in Beluga Bay, drop by and check out my trophy. It's pretty cool.

title: Next Time's Mine, <PlayerName>$Player</>
content:
So you won this time, huh? Well, I guess everyone needs their day in the sun.
But don't get too cozy up there - you've just fired me up to push even harder.
Daddy once told me, "Bobby, winning is temporary, but being a winner is forever." And believe me, next year, I'm reclaiming my victory.
Enjoy your moment, <PlayerName>$Player</>. Because next year, it's Bobby time!

title: Victory Sweet Victory, <PlayerName>$Player</>
content:
Just wanted to take a quick breather from my victory dance to drop you this little note. Gotta admit, the view's pretty spectacular from the top!
You put in some effort, but, well, there's something about Beluga Bay. It's got that special magic.
Catch you later,

title: What A Coincidence, <PlayerName>$Player</>
content:
A draw? With you? I gotta be honest, I didn't see that coming. But, hey, even a broken clock is right twice a day, right?
I've already got big plans for next year and there's no room for sharing the spotlight.
So you better start your prep now, 'cause I'm certainly revving up my engine!

title: Let's Talk Merit Points!
content:
We've started a new initiative called "Merit Points", a reward system for community involvement. I'd love to explain more in person.			
Join me at the Community Center soon. Looking forward to it!

title: Official Notice From Mayor's Office
content:
Please join me at Town Hall for an important announcement concerning our beloved town...

This is not an occasion you'll want to miss!

title: Tier 2 lab devices!
content:
Exciting news! With the town now at rank D, we've got some more grants. That means more advanced quality-of-life devices to help you out!

Check this out: the "Auto Petter" and the "Sturdy Computer". The Auto Petter takes care of your animals, and the computer? It has online shopping!

I've got blueprints ready, but I'll need materials for R&D. Drop by the lab to see other gadgets that are now available to develop.

title: Tier 3 lab devices!
content:
With the town climbing up to rank C, our funding has seen a bump. That means even cooler quality-of-life gadgets for the farm are now on the table!

Let me introduce you to a couple: the "Auto Chest" and the "Ultimate Scarecrow". The auto chest automates your production and can even turn into a conveyor belt. The scarecrow? It covers a 19x19 field!

As usual, I’ve drafted up the blueprints, but I’ll need specific materials for R&D. Swing by the lab when you can.

title: Kickstarter Exclusive "Backer Outfit"
content:
We have three things for you today:

- Backer Pirate Outfit
- Backer Coral Yukata
- Backer Bat Wing
- Backer Butterfly Wing
- Backer Angel Wing
- Backer Crown

Thank you for supporting us and we hope you enjoy this premium backer outfit.

title: Something special at the Museum
content: I've prepared something special for us at the museum. I think you're gonna love it. Meet me there tonight at 7.
